name: INV_CLM_LN_ETRS
description: This table extracts the list of transactions associated with each invoice line.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the invoice record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The list of transactions associated with the invoice number and line.
